title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 28 November 2014 - XWiki
content:
<Denis> has joined #xwiki

08:22 <Flipsi> has joined #xwiki  
08:22 <Flipsi> Hi, is it possible to reindex/ delete index and recreate it because of umlaut problems?  
08:23 <Lyes> has joined #xwiki  
08:24 <gsmeria> has quit  
08:32 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:10 <Lyes> has quit  
09:10 <Lyes> has joined #xwiki  
09:18 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
09:29 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
09:31 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:36 <vmassol> good morning  
09:36 <vmassol> today is our last day before the release of 6.4M1 Monday by Thomas  
09:36 <vmassol> it would be good that we stabilize the build today  
09:36 <vmassol> and to know if anyone has uncommitted stuff that must go in 6.4M1  
09:37 <vmassol> also it would be nice that everyone updates the roadmap page (there are lots of TODO in there ATM): http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Roadmaps/WebHome :)  
09:38 <vmassol> (we're already very late since we're about to release 6.4M1!)
